name: Moonhex+
description:
In a village far away...

Every year, a champion is selected
to claim the Powers of Echelon, 
which are said to bring the longlasting peace
and prosperity to the land.

The chosen one must travel 
across the dangerous eastern road, 
f a c e   t h e   o l d   g o d s
and come back with the gift itself.

But no one has returned from their journey yet... ~ .0. ~ A note from Umut (dev):

Moonhex+ is a straight-up action game. 

It is an updated & improved version of Moonhex,
which was originally a flash game that I released back in 2014. 
I wasn't completely happy with that version,
but that was the best I could do back then.

This version has:
- New enemy types & more variety
- Much smoother controls
- Better game flow
- Fullscreen support & additional music
- And many other improvmements...


Enjoy!
